name: 霍弘毅
objective:
In this course we will study the earliest works of Western Literature on the basis of which just about all the literature of the West has been based. The course is divided into three sections:
　　　　　　　　I The Judaic Revolution: Genesis, Exodus, Psalms
　　　　　　　　II The Greek Miracle: Homer, Sophocles, Plato, Aristotle
　　　　　　　　III The Christian Difference: Mathew, Paul, Nicene Creed
scorePolicy:
40% MID-TERM EXAM: Multiple Choice and Short Answer Questions. NO OPEN BOOK. NO DEVICES.
40% FINAL EXAM: Multiple Choice and Short Answer Questions. NO OPEN BOOK. NO DEVICES
20% 2 page essay based on a thought question. Format: Word document; Times New Roman; 12 pt. font; 1.5 spacing; normal margins.
materials: All readings available through the NTUT Portal.
